definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: perh. palm-tree (Ar. naxlun, n. unit. naxlah;un; v. Perles:JQ, July, 1899, 688);—only pl. abs., [[כִּנְחָלִים נִטָָּיוּ]] Nu 24:6 like palm-trees, which are stretched out, spread out (as to foliage). So Perles:l.c, who compares [[כערבי נחל]] Sir 50:12, LXX w(v stele/xh foinikwn.
